remarks.format: ## Remarks 在折叠状态，功能区组的外观和行为类似于菜单按钮。In the collapsed state, a ribbon group looks and behaves like a menu button. 下图显示了与功能区**剪贴板**，**段落**，和**插入**在其折叠状态的组。The following illustration shows a ribbon with the **Clipboard**, **Paragraph**, and **Insert** groups in their collapsed state. 当为菜单按钮，一个组处于折叠状态时，打开下拉列表时显示其最大大小变体。When a group is collapsed into a menu button, its largest size variation is shown when the drop-down is opened. ![折叠的分组与功能区](~/add/media/wpfribbon-small.png "与折叠组的功能区")![Ribbon with collapsed groups](~/add/media/wpfribbon-small.png "Ribbon with collapsed groups") ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 快捷键提示必须介于 1 到 3 个大写字符，并且必须包含空格、 制表符或换行字符。A KeyTip must be from 1 to 3 uppercase characters, and must not contain spaces, tabs, or newline characters. 键提示有时也称为访问密钥或快捷键，可用作激活控件的快捷组合键。KeyTips are sometimes known as access keys or accelerators and are used as shortcut key combinations that activate controls. 键提示上显示当你按 ALT 键。KeyTips appear on the when you press the ALT key. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!WARNING] > 每个功能区控件继承属性。Each ribbon control inherits a property. 如果设置属性，则不会显示功能区的增强工具提示; 将改为显示标准工具提示。If the property is set, the ribbon’s enhanced ToolTip will not be shown; the standard ToolTip will be shown instead. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|
